Text: Grraaagh!
Huff...huff...
Lady Delta!
I-I'm fine!
These dumbbell things Boss man gave me are so heavy!
Are those... Magic gear filled with mystical power?
Do you mind if I try for myself?
They're heavy, so be careful!
Alright then...
Oh, wow, so heavy!
Hey, that's pretty good. You've got hidden talents!
Whew. They're so heavy, and you kept lifting them?!
Hah! Of course! They were a gift from Boss man!

From their shape, it looks like you can change out
the weights attached to the posts...

Using weight training to increase muscle mass is an
ancient technique, but...

I've never seen a setup like this, with magically
adjustable intensity and a variable weight
system. This is something even a complete
beginner could use.

Such outstanding Shadow Wisdom from Master Shadow!
If we could build a training program around these...

Hold on, would that "program" thingy help me beat
Lady Alpha?
Huh?!
Ummm...
I don't know if you could defeat Lady Alpha...

But, at the very least, no one could top you in
power and speed.

Woo! Yeah! Boss man told me it would make me
stronger!

(Lady Alpha's true strength as a warrior lies beyond
power and speed, though.)

(As an experienced soldier myself, I feel her overall
fighting ability, situational awareness, and judgement
are all outstanding.)

(She has a habit of quietly leading others at normal
times, but in an emergency shows the wisdom and
strength to guide the situation.)

(Which means Lady Delta's chances of defeating her
with power and speed alone are...)
Awoo! Grraaah!

(But Master Shadow might be hoping that Lady Delta
will be able to overcome a strong, clever opponent
with simple basics like power and speed.)
Do you need anything, Lady Delta?
Awoooh, um, I'd like some water!
Understood. I'll bring some at once.

(I get the feeling, though, that there is some other
reason for Lady Delta's intensity.)
(I think it's the combat aura Lady Alpha gives off.)

(Now that we've learned the Templars' story,
the Garden is ready to fight in earnest.)

(So, Lady Alpha is preparing for that, and others in
the Garden have noticed that she's gearing up for
a major fight.)

(And Lady Delta, being so close to to Lady Alpha,
senses it better than anyone.)

(She's sensed it on an instinctive level, and is
naturally driven to train her own skills.)
The decisive battle is just ahead.

I need to give our recruits an attitude adjustment,
as well.

It's going to be essential for them to survive the
deceptions of this world.
Hnnggaaah!

I...will...get stronger! I will hunt them...
To extinction!!
